change_language_title:
Chọn ngôn ngữ bạn muốn sử dụng
và nhấn nút xác nhận để hoàn thành
common_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.
forbidden_title: You do not have permission to view this page.
forbidden_description: You tried to open a restricted area. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact your administrator.
not_found_title: We couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
not_found_description: The link might be broken or the page may have been removed. Check the URL or return to the dashboard to continue exploring.
loading_title: Hold tight, we are preparing your experience.
loading_description: Fetching the latest data and setting things up. This only takes a moment.
change_theme_title:
Chọn chế độ mà bạn muốn sử dụng
và nhấn nút xác nhận để hoàn thành
login_subtitle: Access the administrator dashboard to oversee certificate applications effortlessly.
login_helper: Use your administrator credentials to access certificate requests and approvals.
login_side_description: Track applications, approve credentials, and keep teams informed with real-time updates.
login_highlight_caption: Automate verification steps and reduce processing time by up to 40%.
certificate_type_description_placeholder: Short description about this certificate type
create_certificate_type_success_desc: You created a new certificate type successfully.
update_certificate_type_success_desc: You updated the certificate type successfully.
certificate_type_delete_confirmation_des: Are you sure you want to delete the certificate type {name}? This action cannot be undone.
certificate_type_activate_confirmation_d: Do you want to activate the certificate type {name}? This will make it available for use immediately.
certificate_type_deactivate_confirmation: Do you want to deactivate the certificate type {name}? It will be unavailable until you activate it again.
delete_certificate_type_success_desc: You deleted the certificate type successfully.
activate_certificate_type_success_desc: You activated the certificate type successfully.
deactivate_certificate_type_success_desc: You deactivated the certificate type successfully.
certificate_type_confirmation_title: {type, select, delete {Delete certificate type} activate {Activate certificate type} deactivate {Deactivate certificate type} other {Confirm action}}
certificate_type_confirmation_desc: {type, select, delete {Are you sure you want to delete the certificate type {name}? This action cannot be undone.} activate {Do you want to activate the certificate type {name}? This will make it available for use immediately.} deactivate {Do you want to deactivate the certificate type {name}? It will be unavailable until you activate it again.} other {Are you sure you want to continue with {name}?}}
registration_approve_confirmation: Are you sure you want to approve?
registration_reject_confirmation: Please provide a reason to reject.
approve_registration_success_desc: The registration has been approved successfully.
reject_registration_success_desc: The registration has been rejected successfully.
register_org_hero_title: Register your organization for trusted credentials
register_org_hero_subtitle: Share your institutional details and we will configure a pilot tailored to your programs.
register_org_section_reason_desc: From secure issuance to instant verification, our team helps academic and training partners launch in weeks.
register_org_highlight_security_desc: Tamper-proof certificates anchored on blockchain with full audit trails.
register_org_highlight_onboarding_desc: API and dashboard support to integrate across academic and training teams.
register_org_highlight_verification_desc: Give employers and partners real-time confirmation for every credential.
register_org_contact_prefer_text: Prefer a quick chat? Reach our partnership desk:
register_org_contact_response_time: We respond within one business day.
register_org_form_description: Provide the details below so we can prepare the compliance package and onboarding plan.
register_org_form_success: Registration received. Our partnership team will reach out soon.
register_org_form_error_default: Unable to submit the registration form.
register_org_personal_info_description: Tell us who will be the primary contact so we can support you promptly.
register_org_organization_info_descripti: Share more details so we can tailor the right solution for your programs.
register_org_programs_placeholder: Describe the certificates or programs you issue today.
register_org_form_disclaimer: By submitting this form you agree to receive onboarding updates from CertifyChain.
register_org_wallet_unavailable: MetaMask is not available in this browser
register_org_wallet_step_description: Connect your organization's wallet to complete the registration.
